Html:
I use control ChartPlotter (DynamicDataDisplay).

I have some questions with control capability.

So, problem: created window with two ChartPlotters. Every ChartPlotter have 6 data array (total array in plotters is 12).

When number of points in array push in 2000 (total number of points in all array 2*12000 = 24000) user interface is bad respond  any action.

When number of points in array push in 3000 (total number of points in all array 2*18000 = 36000) user interface is too bad respond  any action.

 I want to know, this is extreme capability of control ?

 Thanks a lot. Faithfully
